version_description:
We've been tinkering behind the scenes to make the Student Beans app better for you. Here's what you get in the latest update:
- Addition of barcodes
- Bug fixes

We've been tinkering behind the scenes to make the Student Beans app better for you. Here's what you get in the latest update:
- Bug fixes

We've been tinkering behind the scenes to make the Student Beans app better for you. Here's what you get in the latest update:
- Bug fixes

We've been tinkering behind the scenes to make the Student Beans app better for you. Here's what you get in the latest update:
- Addition of QR codes
- Bug fixes

We've been tinkering behind the scenes to make the Student Beans app better for you. Here's what you get in the latest update:
- Addition of local venues for selected stores.
- Bug fixes

Find the nearest location where you can use your in-store offer. Click for the quickest directions to get there. This new feature means you can grab a burrito or pizza super speedy. Sorted.

We're adding more brands to our new 'Nearest Location' service every day, so keep your eyes peeled!

We've also given our offer pages a little tidy up. We hope you like our new look!

- We've given our page layouts a little polish - We hope you like our new look!
- Bug Fixes.

- Going out shopping? Check the instore tab to see what discounts are available around you, or check a city in advance!
- We've added more venues since the last update, and there's plenty more to come. Keep checking back to see what's available near you!
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Updated account settings
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimising the app and been fixing some bugs!

We've been working hard behind the scenes to improve the app for you. Check out the brand new collections on our explore page, which group together some of the best discounts around - including what's hottest this Black Friday!
- We've been optimizing the app and been fixing some bugs!
- We've been optimizing the app and been fixing some bugs!

Save for Later - it’s the feature you’ve all been waiting for! Simply click the save icon on any discount, and these will be added to your Saved page. You’re then able to access this list anytime, anywhere!
- We've been optimizing the app and been fixing some bugs!
Hey friends, we’ve been busy prepping some BTS changes. Watch this space for more updates to come!
For this update we’ve added a handy new map feature. Now you can easily see the in-store discounts in your area. Stay tuned for more in-store offers coming soon!
Hey friends! Anyone with an iPhone 5 (remember those?) if you want to keep getting dem sweet deals, make sure you upgrade your phone to iOS 11 or later.
We’ve been optimizing the app and been fixing some bugs!
We’ve been optimizing the app and been fixing some bugs!

It's here! Student Beans 3.0.0!

We’ve got a brand new way of finding awesome new discounts.

Check out our redesigned Explore tab to find your fave discounts and more.

We hope you love this new experience as much as our team loved making it for you.

We've got loads more exciting features coming soon!

We've moved 'Search' so you can access it much easier. Check it out at the bottom of your screen in the main menu.

Stay safe and healthy from all of us at Student Beans.

Stay safe and healthy from all of us at Student Beans.

In-store offers are back - remember to stay safe out there!

After a short break, discount categories are back (we know you missed them). You can now find them in the 'Explore' section of the app.

We’ve also made a few improvements and removed some bugs to make things smoother!

We’ve added Sign in with Apple for you to access Student Beans using your Apple ID! You can find this option at the sign up/log in screen.

Bug fixes and general improvements to make our app better for you.

Think we can do something better or want to let us know you love the app? We’d love your feedback. You can find a brand new feedback form by going to Settings (top left) and then tapping “Send Us Feedback” near the bottom of the screen.
